entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: VPCLMULQDQ Intrinsics #95772
  • QuicListener.IsSupported behavior is flaky on DebianArm64 #95771
  • crossgen2 failure in VMR when using VMR stage 2 build scenario #95768
  • SuperPMI: add JIT memory diff measurements in per-PR pipeline runs #95767
    Future
  • Local running of libraries tests is broken #95762
    9.0.0
  • .NET RPM packages are failing FIPS verification #95759
  • [PGO] assert "Mismatch in align instruction." #95755
    9.0.0
  • RemoveAllKeyed Requires Equality Operator #95754
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Windows stress builds are broken #95750
    9.0.0
  • JIT: missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #95747
    Future
  • Wrong disposal of FileConfigurationSource.FileProvider by FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose() on a modification of ConfigurationManager.Sources #95745
  • Documentation error for System.IO.Directory.GetFiles(string path, string searchPattern, EnumerationOptions enumerationOptions) #95730
    Future
  • .NET 8 macOS *.app does not launch after code signing #95727
  • UseManagedNtlm in NET8 cannot authenticate NTLM on IIS with Extended Protection Accept & Required #95725
    9.0.0
  • DriveInfo.GetDrives() - Debian 12 #95720
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_13910/GitHub_13910/GitHub_13910.cmd #95713

Closed

  • SerialPort is not supported on Android ? #86619
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] [outerloop] jit-format: Format job found errors, please apply the format patch #95159
  • JIT: Unroll GT_BLK via two regs instead of one #93249
    Future
  • AccessViolation when reading last byte from pointer to BitmapData #84287
    9.0.0
  • Serial Port support on Android #58740
    Future
  • Generic type check allocates for nullable structs #95685
    9.0.0
  • System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException: Ambiguous match found. #95736
  • FrozenDictionary case insensitive comparer not working correctly #95732
  • Guard against invalid TypeToConvert args to read methods of object and collection converter #36605
    Future
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 6.0 January servicing SDK installed, the WindowsDesktop runtime should be display as "6.0.26" not "6.0.25". #95566
  • Widespread "Optimizing assemblies for size is not supported for the selected publish configuration" failures #95712
  • System.Reflection.Metadata Dependency question #95626
    Future
  • [net8.0-ios] App crashes on ios device when calling static abstract generic interface method in a sealed class #94467
    9.0.0
  • upgrade to .net 8.0 error CS8347, How to solve it? please. #95686
  • CA2017 reports Logging has wrong number of arguments #95584
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Add explicit successor for BBJ_COND false branch #95773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [Android] Bump target SDK version for Android sample #95770
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Move a lock to protect m_pDynamicStaticsInfo #95769
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update area-Tracing-coreclr and area-UWP owners #95766
    area-Meta
  • Optimize a castclass over nullables #95764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move `StartupHooks` tests and remaining uses of PortableApp project to pre-built test assets #95761
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Replaced string concatenation by StringBuilder usage #95760
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Enable Windows runs of AddressSanitizer #95758
    area-Infrastructure
  • [tests] Use shorter path for temp directory on Apple mobile platforms #95757
    os-ios, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • Disable Mono interpreter runs for capacity issues #95756
    needs-area-label
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Use Program.dll instead of Program.exe in illink docs #95752
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Add flowgraph dumping for new loops #95748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update IHostApplicationBuilder.cs #95746
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Small tweak for branch optimizer #95740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove most loop-related hoisting quirks #95734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated #95733
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Remove loop-related VN quirks #95729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Clean up the thread local memory regardless of managed thread's presence #95722
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add CFG build for EventPipe enabled #95721
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use python venv for SPMI collection on linux #95714
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add Android support to System.IO.Ports #95749
    area-System.IO.Ports
  • Move many interop tests to run in-proc and move many to built in the merged runner itself #94109
    test-enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: refactor CSE heuristics #95705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix optRedirectBlock for "fallthrough" BBJ_ALWAYS #95724
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Switch morph DFS to use general DFS #95726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update version of Microsoft.Diagnostics.Tracing.TraceEvent package #95680
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Migrate to the 'locker' GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #95432
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_EQ_3A to IF_SVE_HR_3A #95679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Temporarily disable "extra" CoreCLR perf runs on arm64 #95728
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix comment typo in array.cpp #95709
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove arm/x86 conditions from mono.proj #95739
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Make isRemovableJmpCandidate less restrictive on AMD64 #95493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix function prototype warning in debugger-engine.c #95735
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Update terminology in loop cloning, and simplify a bit #95648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove boxing from "value is S" for nullables #95711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix typos in NonGC-heap.md #95731
    area-Meta
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Port VN and loop hoisting to new loop representation #95589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] LoongArch code sync #95673
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Run native AOT legs on illink changes #95719
    needs-area-label
  • Build tests as self-contained for native AOT #95718
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static calls and handle nullable value types #94787
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Clean up the thread local memory regardless of managed thread's presence #95715
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Make sure LOHThreshold less than region_size #95485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Stop falling back to interpreter for runtime invoke #95469
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (4/N) #95670
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Added `SVE_GD_2A` ARM64 encoding #95618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add Arm N2 SVE perfscore file #95700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Use full TLS record size for application data on Windows #95595
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Per CMake docs, mark all RC-only DLLs and C++/CLI DLLs that do not export unmanaged symbols as `MODULE` libraries. #95532
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add post-phase validation of DFS tree #95682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95582
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Consolidate wasi/wasm build bits #95535
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][mt] dynamic thread create #95702
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE_GK_2A and SVE_GL_1A arm64 encodings #95707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILLink: Allow interface methods to not have newslot #95571
    Servicing-consider, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Reduce use of madvise DODUMP/DONTDUMP #95643
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Build fixes for Bionic on x64 #95382
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95302
    Servicing-consider, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NO-MERGE][WIP] Testing Swift interop CI lines #95699
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Reenable disabled nativeaot warnings and fix the issues #95698
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • [LoongArch64] add LoongArch64's SIMD128/256 instructions within emitter. #95456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • React to new Package Validation change #94432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #94582
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Generate interface lists for necessary EETypes #95683
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove dependency on AppDomain from a hello world app #95710
    needs-area-label
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] PInvoke exception throwing #2454

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Integrate dotnet.js into ILCompiler.LLVM #2453
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable libraries testing #2452
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement WasmImportlinkage #2444
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet list package` command options should support shorter names. For example, -f for --framework. Have to specify the long name every time. #37385
  • dotnet tool update form private registry fails #37379
  • [NETSDKE2E]The directory "C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk-manifests" could not be deleted after uninstalling 6.0.312 SDK. #37374
  • Supporting commandLineArgs in launchsettings.json as an array of strings #37373
  • Dotnet SDK 8 breaks deterministic builds #37371

Closed

  • .NET 8 SDK upgrade breaks MSBuildLocator #37111
  • OutputType does not set Nt headers correctly on Linux #3990
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk imports CustomBeforeDirectoryBuildProps after DirectoryBuildPropsPath #36749
  • "AfterPublish" doesn't invoked #26710
    8.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37386
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #37384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37382
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check dependencies of Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver against baseline #37381
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Disable Source Link's EmbedUntrackedSources in desktop WPF projects #37164
    Servicing-approved, Area-SourceLink, 8.0.2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #36787
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add escape hatch for publishing with SelfContained=true, but no RuntimeIdentifier. #37368
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Permit setting whether to use workload sets or loose manifests Fixes #34561 #37346
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #35088
    Area-Tools, 8.0.2xx
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Containers support was moved higher to enable creating image of CLI apps #37335
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Open issue: relax requirement that type be enumerable to participate in collection expressions #7744
  • [Proposal]: Params Collections #7700
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: BinaryCompatOnlyAttribute #7706

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typo in params-collections.md #7745

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create an 'Indenting String Builder' type to allow users to easily generate C# code that looks good, with almost no overhead. #71162
  • It looks like Collection Expressions feature is missing tests for missing APIs that are required by `SynthesizedInlineArrayAsReadOnlySpanMethod` #71160
  • `ImmutableArray<object>.Empty` is not equal to `ImmutableArray<object> c = []` #71159
  • IDE0290 refactoring doesn't work in presense of `GeneratedRegex` #71149
  • NU1608: Detected package version outside of dependency constraint #71146
  • Wrong handling of readonly field in ref struct which holds another ref struct #71144
  • IDE0055 is not reported for tabs instead of spaces after a single line comment in collection initializers #71143

Closed

  • `MemberNotNull` not works for local functions #71092
  • Consider an alternative representation for binary expressions in the syntax model #70865
  • ExperimentalAttribute and ObsoleteAttribute are reported in non-consistent way #70823
    17.9
  • IDE0290 Primary Constructor refactoring generates invalid code when used with `out` parameters of static functions #71152
  • Incorrect result of multiple compound assignment operator #71139
  • IDE0305 Introduces Race Condition #71145
  • EnC: changing parameter suppresses method body analysis #68708
    17.9 P3
  • EnC - Allow capturing new variables in lambdas #54672
    17.9 P3
  • SemanticEdit API changes: Obsolete PreserveLocalVariables, add RuntimeRudeEdits #70450
    17.9
  • EnC Razor scenario: allow adding new lambda closures #67841
    17.9 P3
  • IDE0290 refactoring could leave `pragma`s after field removal #71119
  • Implicit index indexer doesn't work in object initializer #67533
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Update status/details on implicit indexers in object initializers #71164
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • API proposal for an IndentingStringBuilder. #71163
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add QuickInfo for collection expression brackets #71161
    Area-IDE, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Collection expressions: tests for spreads of dynamic and non-generic IEnumerable collections #71158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add back request telemetry in CLaSP queue #71157
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Skip the pack step in integration tests #71153
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Start local function analysis with captured variables marked "not null" #71148
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • WIP #71142
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. Part 1/N. #71141
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not resolve diagnostics early during attribute binding #71140
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Set order of precedence for obsoletion attribute family #71043
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix LSIF generator's indexing of Razor projects #71128
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Block 'use primary constructor' when constructor has out-vars that span multiple statements #71155
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cherry-pick the LINQ expression fix #71132
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Block 'use collection expression' on certain types #71154
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged, 17.9 P3
  • Use primary constructor pragmas #71131
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Skip the signing step in integration tests #71151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to ParamsCollections #71150
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add "Params Collections" feature to Language Feature Status.md #71138
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Loosen compiler restriction which was not required by the spec #71110
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow collection expressions with `CreateCompilation` #71134
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Add OrchardCore test to OptProf config #69909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make trivial Params Collections scenarios working end to end #71136
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: align ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind() with spec #70975
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. Part 2/N #68990
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ForgotPasswordRequest is not included in IdentityEndpointsJsonSerializerContext #52646
  • Make IDataProtectionKeyContext settable #52645
  • JsonSourceGenerationOptions does not Integrate with ASP. NET Core correctly #52642
  • JwtBearerPostConfigureOptions registration being override by PostConfigureAuthenticationSchemeOptions<TOptions> when calling AddJwtBearer #52641
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #52640
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #52639
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props does not get imported correctly #52637
  • Allow fallback to no prerendering when prerendering fails for Blazor interactive render modes #52633
  • Allow multiple root components and/or render modes to be registered in Blazor Web Apps #52631
  • HotReloading stops refreshing a page in RazorPages/RazorView when we use async OnGet in @functions section #52630
  • `Blazor` JavaScript object and related type definitions should be available (`@types/blazor`, `@types/dotnet`) #52629
  • ASP0018 complains about catch-all parameter without proposing any solutions #52628
  • Quarantine HelixPlatform_QuicListenerIsSupported #52623
  • IExceptionHandler not being called when using UseDeveloperExceptionPage() #52622
  • Blazor WASM MSAL Published Application Gets Stuck on "Completing Login" #52619
  • minimalapi.json of aspnet-codegenerator has obsolete and incomplete options #52618
  • OIDC NonceCookie/CorrelationCookie not accepted in HTTP environment #52617

Closed

  • Add Content-Id as a header name #52486
  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultInboundClaimTypeMap.Clear() no longer effective in .NET 8 #52615
    Discussions
  • Duplicate, delete this #52643
  • [SignalR Typescript library] Floating Promise/Unhandled promise rejection in Invocation message callbacks #52524
    9.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #52612
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #52621
  • Perf regression: json #52620
  • net8 packages (e.g. Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly 8.0.0) target netstandard2.0 (and other various frameworks), but according to Microsoft they can only be used on net8 #52332
  • Using @ref with inheritance in Blazor doesn't work #52039
  • Authentication with WebApplicationFactory/TestServer HttpClient #52536
  • [Blazor] `NavigationManager.Refresh()` fails during static server rendering if server interactivity is enabled #51482
    Planning: WebUI
  • NavigationManager.Refresh throws on SSR-only pages #51222
    Planning: WebUI
  • Will calling HttpResponse.WriteAsync() cause HttpResponse.HasStarted to be set to true #45719
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Azure B2C does not work with latest Blazor Web App Identity template #52309
  • .NET 8.0 Blazor Web App EditForm loses values #52347
  • ASP.NET Core 8 Identity register Endpoints issue with SQLite Provider EF Core #52426
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google doesn't work out of the box with swagger UI #52432

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52647
    area-blazor
  • Make IDataProtectionKeyContext settable #52644
    area-dataprotection
  • [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52638
    area-blazor
  • Remove superfluous subtraction #52635
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Quarantine HelixPlatform_QuicListenerIsSupported #52624
    area-networking

Merged

  • Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #52523
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • redis force-reconnect; fix release failure scenario #52608
    feature-caching, area-networking, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52559
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • fix version typo #52601
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [2.1] Fix IPNetwork.Contains for prefixes which are not at start of subnet range. #50967
    * NO MERGE *, area-networking, area-middleware, 2.1.x
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • signalr `DefaultDisconectTimeout` typo #52599
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Make user in ValidateAsync nullable #52604
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix deserializing null properties to Protobuf types #52468
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix reading null struct property value in gRPC JSON transcoding #52469
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix auto import of proto files when gRPC JSON transcoding is a transitive reference #52470
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • List built-in Metrics with `dotnet-counters list` #4401
  • Dotnet-counters doesn't work with C# UWP project #4425

Updated

  • Diagnostics v8.0.452401 Unable to insert breakpoint 1 at 00007ff9e3121930, Win32 error 0n998 #4424
    9.0.0
  • dotnet-counters collect all counters #4378
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Migrate to the Locker GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #4417

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: Can not perform this action after onSaveInstanceState on MAUI Blazor (Hybrid) when opened from Android IntentFilter #19304
  • Android - Setting only SelectedTabColor on TabbedPage causes System.NullReferenceException #19299
  • [iOs] MAUI Blazor Hybrid '//' urls not treated as secure #19297
  • Child controls doesn't ignore safeArea even if you've disabled the safe area for the page in .Net 8 #19296
  • iOS - Picker does Not Resize Automatically After Selection #19295
    Backlog
  • Could not implement ICLLocationManagerDelegate anymore #19294
  • A simple app crashed with AccessViolationException #19293
  • WPF style OpacityMask #19292
    Backlog
  • [.NET MAUI] [BUG] UI doesn't "always" update inside BottomSheetDialogFragment. #19291
    Backlog
  • [Android] Adding a PointerGestureRecognizer to a button on Android stops the button from working #19289
    Backlog
  • Enable UI Testing on Mac Catalyst using Mac idiom #19288
    Backlog
  • Unable to use VerifyScreenshot for Mac Catalyst UI Tests #19286
    Backlog
  • [UITesting] Setup Appium Testing Path that lets us run our testing suite against Nugets vs project references #19285
    Backlog
  • [UITesting] Add Appium Testing Path that lets us test various external application #19284
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.3] Incremental build not working in MAUI for android target #19282
  • [regression/8.0.3] The Android app crashes when you click the back button on the second navigation page after publishing apk #19280

Closed

  • Initially hidden StackLayout doesn't render if bound IsVisible changes #18820
  • Shell.Current.GotoAsync works on Simulator but Does not work on iPad #8358
  • Failure Building Due to Splash Screen Image splashSplashScreen.png #15515
  • Shell and TabbedPage #18974
  • Scrollview inside of Stacklayout doesn't work at all #19290
  • [Windows] App with FlexLayout crashes when resizing window #18515
    Backlog
  • [.NET MAUI] Application Crashes on Windows when Scaling Window which Contains Nested FlexLayout #19265
  • [regression/8.0.0-nightly] [MacCatalyst] Cannot click a button on MAUI nightly #19154
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [regression/7.0.96] [Windows] Uneven rows in vertical CollectionView do not resize when item content size changes #18078
    .NET 8 SR1
  • InputView MaxLengthProperty appears to be declared incorrectly #17780
  • Nightly build 9717 - Box View Color and MVVM Button Command not working #19287
  • Setting Shell.FlyoutWidth in code-behind on Windows throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException #19068
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.0] Building a NuGet package from .NET MAUI Class Library with Source Link results in the error described. #12309
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Problem encountered on https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/maui/first-app-tutorial/create #19123
  • BackgroundImageSource does not work in iOS - .net 8 #19176
  • VerticalTextAlignment of Label is not applied in Popup. #19279
  • Using FlyoutPage with NavigationPage not working on dotnet 8 #19243
  • MAUI Picker Control fails to show items in .NET 7 on Mac Catalyst Desktop #19273
  • Emoji Issue on Windows #15077
  • CollectionView SelectionMode Multiple displays wrong ItemTemplate on Windows #19277
  • Cursor Position set to beginning of Entry #14752
    Backlog
  • WinUI and iOS. InputTransparent does not work. #15087
    Backlog
  • Android app crash in release Mode #15997

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Make Flyout footer aware of header/content margin #19303
  • Add design time converters #19301
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    community ✨
  • Initially a preview release #19298

Merged

  • [ci] Execute build.ps1 from bash on Mac to avoid STDIO streams hang #19257
  • Set CancelsTouchesInView for custom PGR #19283
  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18932
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 SR1
  • Correct InputView.MaxLengthProperty declaring type #17788
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration

    platform/windows 🪟, area/layout 🔲, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add-Migration generate migration with missing "using" statement when a property is an enum defined in another namespace and using a conversion. #32552
  • ComplexProperty & ValueGenerator #32550
  • Enable providers to change type mapping characteristics based on collation #32546
  • More than 2 Unions cannot be translated #32544
  • Redundant inner SELECTs when loading Many-To-Many association #32541
  • The DataContext created by scaffold cannot be used #32539

Closed

  • MigrationBuilder.Sql truncating sql string... #32549
  • Allow Migrations assemble to be loaded from different assemblyLoadContexts #32461
    9.0.0
  • Index was outside the bounds of the array while saving changes #32538
  • How to achieve on-demand data loading #32540
  • Cold shoulder issue #32536

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix splitting migrations SQL by GO #32548
  • [release/8.0] Make proxies thread-safe accessing a navigation once loaded #32547
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix Contains within SQL Server aggregate functions #32543
    Servicing-consider
  • Fix to #1015 - Remove QueryBugsTest class #32542

Merged

  • Update dependencies.props #32551
  • Move ModelBuilding tests to EFCore.Specification.Tests #32530
  • Allow specifying Assembly for migrations #32473
    community-contribution
  • Make proxies thread-safe accessing a navigation once loaded #32522

Updated

  • Don't consider a generated value stable just because it was explicitly set #32497
  • Add DbContextOptions composibility support #32518
    breaking-change

entry.content:
Issues
